effects.effect: Choose one heroic ability from the following options, each of which costs 5 essence to use. Alternatively, you can choose one of the 5-essence abilities you didn't select at 1st level (see 1st-Level Features).

features.name: O Flower Aid, O Earth Defend
features.flavor: Revitalizing plants and jagged stones grow, helping allies and hindering foes.

effects.name: Effect
effects.effect:
Until the start of your next turn, the area gains the following effects:
- Once as a free maneuver at the start of your turn, you allow yourself and each ally in the area to spend any number of Recoveries.
- The area is difficult terrain for enemies.
- Each enemy who enters the area for the first time in a combat round or starts their turn there takes damage equal to your Reason score.

effects.name: Persistent 1
effects.effect:
The area remains until the start of your next turn. As a maneuver, you can move the area up to 5 squares. This ability ends if the area is ever not within your line of effect.
